description: This file defines the LoginScreen widget for a Flutter app, including form fields for username and password, login logic, and navigation to the registration screen.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget that displays the login form and manages authentication.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class for LoginScreen, manages form state and interaction.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the login screen, including form fields and buttons.
